mapper.insert: INSERT INTO et_product_review ( user_id, product_id, order_id, rating, content ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{productId}, #{orderId}, #{rating}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT review_id, user_id, product_id, order_id, rating, content, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM et_product_review WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}

SELECT review_id, user_id, product_id, order_id, rating, content, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM et_product_review WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY review_id DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT review_id, user_id, product_id, order_id, rating, content, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM et_product_review WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY review_id DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE et_product_review SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE review_id = #{reviewId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
